abstract: China First Heavy Industries, a maker of heavy machinery, said Friday that it would launch an initial public offering in Shanghai in the coming week, aiming to raise at least 8.4 billion renminbi.
snippet: China First Heavy Industries, a maker of heavy machinery, said Friday that it would launch an initial public offering in Shanghai in the coming week, aiming to raise at least 8.4 billion renminbi.
lead_paragraph: China First Heavy Industries, a maker of heavy machinery, said Friday that it would hold an initial public offering in Shanghai in the coming week, aiming to raise at least 8.4 billion renminbi.

headline.main: China First Heavy Among List of Shanghai I.P.O.’s
